This page provides an overview of the traffic, delay and punctuality situation in the [EUROCONTROL Area](/definition/eurocontrol-area/). For a more detailed analysis consult our [Daily traffic variation dashboard](https://www.eurocontrol.int/Economics/DailyTrafficVariation-States.html){target="_blank"}. Information on en-route and terminal [service units](/acronym/su/) from the [Central Route Charges Office of EUROCONTROL (CRCO)](https://www.eurocontrol.int/crco){target="_blank"} is available from our [Service Units dashboard](https://www.eurocontrol.int/ServiceUnits/Dashboard/EnRouteMainDashboard.html){target="_blank"}.
